CustomField.formula: IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "01","January", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "02","February", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "03","March", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "04","April", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "05","May", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "06","June", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "07","July", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "08","August", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "09","September", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "10","October", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "11","November", IF(MID( TEXT (Date_of_Booking__c) ,6,2) = "12","December", NULL )))))))))))) & TEXT( YEAR(Date_of_Booking__c) )
CustomField.label: Month that Booking Was Made
